attributes.action: Provide financial support to all the former XL.com crew
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: XL leisure was delared bankrupt all XL stafff lost their jobs with out any final pay or any finacial support. They were not even give any advice on what they should do..... Why is this allowed to happen a fund should be set up to help them get through...

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
